verbs.description: [V: hamilton] [ARG1: water] named best tasting in the world for the second time in five years judges have sampled hamilton tap water and deemed it the best tasting in the world british columbia berkeley springs w va american water works association gold medal of the royal astronomical society hamilton annual berkeley springs international water bath berkeley springs west virginia emporia kansas greenwood
